Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The room was a little small but not a real issue as we didn t spend much time in it
Positive_Review: Cleanliness of the room and overall hotel was excellent The staff were very friendly and helpful location great and very close to Metro line overall very impressed and would definately recommend Lovely breakfast as well

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: New Super clean friendly staff comfortable beds and memory foam pillows For my needs excellent location for city visit needs use of metro but Paris is so big you must count on using the metro anyway Would recommend it to anyone with need to be in or around 12th Arrondissement

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: Good rooms even though small as all in Paris Nice spacious bathroom with separate toilet Very quiet A C worked well Did not have breakfast at the hotel not included Close to bus station and Metro Walking distance to Accor Hotel Arena

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The instructions for parking were not very clear so i wasted alot of time to find the parking and to get out from Accessibility of parking is very strange
Positive_Review: Location and personnell very good

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: A tiny bit of trouble with communication as to information regarding parking
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly helpful and accommodating Very clean and smart accomadation throughout Excellent location for the purpose of our family adventure to the Accor arena the icing on the cake

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: But the area is not great with few nice cafes and just not beat area
Positive_Review: Room amenities were great Rooms were clean and staff was really friendly Hotel is close to the metro

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: All the staff we met were good but the receptionist when we arrived and left was utterly charming could not have been more helpful AND spoke excellent English I m only sorry I did not get his name because there was a young man who does credit to the hotel and deserves to go far

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The staff were fantastic helpful and really friendly I had quite a lot of things i needed staff to help with such as printing my boarding passes for my trip home and nothing was too much trouble The hotel is 15 min walk from the Accor Hotel Arena and there is a metro stop close by with a direct line to the Eiffel Tower

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: the staff are really friendly welcoming and speak English on arrival they gave us a map of Paris highlighted where the hotel was The rooms are clean with air conditioning the beds are comfortable The hotel offers a continental buffet breakfast for 14 euros The hotel is next to the metro station and is only 5 minutes walk from the Accord Hotels Arena plenty of caf bars within a few minutes walk

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The room could have a better choice of TV channels for foreign guests as we only had BBC world news for British travellers It would also benefit from a mini fridge in room to keep cool small bottles of water or cans of soda We also found it impossible to find ice in or around the hotel to take to our room and enjoy a chilled bottle of champagne on the balcony and therefore had to gulp it down quickly due to the heatwave
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable We stayed in room 801 which had a view although limited of the Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame It was very hot during our stay and the air conditioning worked perfectly We would recommend this hotel to others but as space inside the room is limited we would advise no large suitcase or holdalls

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Considering it is rated as 4star disappointed that there wasn t a fridge in the room Hot breakfast didn t look very appetising needs abit more variety
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful friendly nothing was too much trouble

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The property is 100m from the Dugommier metro which is great when you re carrying bags There s a lovely bakery around the corner and a Monoprix supermarket across the road so that s very convenient The area right outside the hotel is not the cleanest but it s nothing to complain about We would definitely stay here again The staff were super friendly and accommodating

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: If you require a big room then this hotel is not for you Our room was very small but it was sufficient for what we needed so it did not bother us that much
Positive_Review: Very modern design of the room

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The room was really small There was no extra space A couple of hooks by the entrance would have been helpful for hanging coats
Positive_Review: The croissants were extra flakey The beds were comfortable The room and bathroom was recently renovated Nice view from the seventh floor Easy access to metro

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The hotel was by a metro station with a cafe patisserie supermarket and places to eat a couple of minutes away Staff were brilliant helpful and friendly Room was spotlessly clean and modern beds comfortable and a good nights sleep Absolutely no complaints

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: I thought the hotel was closer to the Gare Lyon but if one has luggage and is tired it is definitely better to take the number 87 bus from Gare Lyon which will take you right across the street from the hotel There was also some construction going on across the street so this impacted the view but it wasn t too noisy
Positive_Review: Great spot for an overnight to recover from a long flight from the US Nice room and lovely bathroom Staff were very helpful

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Booking com advertised at the time we booked the hotel that it had free airport shuttle but they didn t they only call you a cab as their shuttle and it cost 54 Flat rate We requested early check in were inform when we arrived at noon that it will cost 40 if we wanted that
Positive_Review: Clean and comfortable Very convenient location since it is right by the Dugommier metro station We didn t spend too much time in the hotel but the room had all the amenities we needed They also had free bag storage we took advantage of that when we couldn t check in early

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Bedroom was tiny not a lot of room to move about Also very noisy
Positive_Review: Nice hotel and brilliant location next to the metro station Staff very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: We booked with breakfast but at the end we didn t have it because somehow the reservation was without breakfast very strange Maybe booking fault or the hotel we don t know The location is not that good to justify the price
Positive_Review: Very clean and the photos really correspond to the description Staff is nice Next to the metro

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Everything was excellent Nothing could be better
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel very clean with attention to detail and delightful staff Very near to Autorail Station where we could pick up our car the following day Would definitely stay there again

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: There was little to dislike about this hotel
Positive_Review: A well located hotel very near the Metro and a few stops from the centre of Paris Very useful to exploit the Metro and the hotel is a couple of stops from main stations Excellent service and very friendly and capable staff

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Nothing There was a metro station right outside we could not have asked for more Paris map provided on arrival It was much better than we were expecting
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy we were on 5th floor and had good views room was like a boutique hotel it gave me that feel good factor when I walked in Staff spoke English and were very helpful and pleasant and caring We would go again

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The heating in the bedroom did not appear to work
Positive_Review: The location is excellent for the Bercy Arena and the bed was very comfortable The staff on reception were very pleasant and helpful

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: Proximity to the metro station was a definite plus Made getting around a breeze Rooms were lovely with comfortable beds The welcome and check out staff were lovely and friendly As a bonus there is a little patisserie around the corner that does amazing croissants Would definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The location is not very central although it wasn t a big issue using the metro Just not a very Paris y feel to be so far out Do not spend 14 on breakfast it wasn t very good very plain It s best to go to the bakery next door
Positive_Review: Metro station right outside the hotel The room windows open which was really nice to get some fresh air Staff was very accommodating and helpful

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Location size if the room were schokingly small Not impressed by the standard of the room Would not visit again
Positive_Review: Decor of the room and shower room was nice and the staff

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Noise very thin walls other residents right next door to us although the hotel didn t have many people in had complained about the noise of our tv it was under the autmatic volume when the tv is turned on coffee machine didn t work telephone broken cup of old cigarettes hadn t been cleaned away from previous residents not much room to put clothes 15 Euros for a small pot of food that was apparently dinner from the menu was awful Was told off twice for high volume in the morning when we were reporting how bad our stay was the woman on the counter raised her voice and gave little advice empathy Not a nice stay this has made us not want to go to this hotel let alone Paris again
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and gave us extra bits like shampoo shavers etc

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The aircon is set for the whole building we would have prefered it to be adjustable as we wanted our room to be cooler
Positive_Review: Reception staff very friendly helpful Clean modern bathrooms Excellent location for metro access

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Extremely small bedroom I know this is Paris but it is also supposed to be a 4 star hotel Good if you are traveling solo with little luggage though
Positive_Review: Cool design comfortable bed room full of light good view from the room

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: the location not easy to reach upon arrival without a taxi but once you are there the metro is just on the corner and even the bus stop
Positive_Review: The Shower everything

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Rooms are very small but absolutely fine for short break 12 tube stops to Eiffel so a little out of the main attractions but only 13km from airport
Positive_Review: Clean rooms big beds nice decor and right near tube station

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The rooms are quite small but perfectly fine for a short stay The staff are excellent and very helpful and the hotel is almost on top of the Metro so it is very easy to access tourist areas and railway stations There are a number of good restaurants as well as a boulangerie and great cheese shop close by

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: escaped from the Paris hottest days in this summer thus we needed an air conditioned room tidy room comfy bed one minute to the metro station staff are very kind worth this price and will come back again

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The ladies at the reception are super nice all of them They always spend time to have a little chat and they do their best to help you with any request Also the rest of the staff is very friendly and respectful I had a very comfortable time in this hotel

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: It was a lovely surprise to find such a well priced hotel in Paris it was so clean and tastefully decorated and the staff were amazingly helpful and friendly definitely recommend to anyone staying in Paris

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The welcome by the ladies at the reception was really very good and very friendly The room was excellent we loved the bed bath wifi climate and coffee teamaker Metro Dugommier at 20 metres also tr s pratique We will come back

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The staff were about as friendly as I have experienced anywhere They were knowledgeable competent and far above what I expected I will use this hotel whenever I am in Paris in future

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Location is handy for catching trains nearby ie bercy and Gare de Lyon but not ideal location for a holiday
Positive_Review: Excellent location to catch an early train from Bercy and 10 minutes in a cab to Bastille Hotel staff really friendly and efficient it is very modern and spotless

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Room was on the corner so it was a little small possibly typical Paris though
Positive_Review: Newly renovated rooms with good facilities great staff and noise sealed rooms

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: there is nothing to improve Keep up the great work
Positive_Review: My fiance and I could not be happier about our hotel choice Location is fantastic it is a bit away from all the happenings but it is right by a metro station It seriously is only few steps away and Paris metro system is easy to use and gets you anywhere in no time Check in was great I am very sad I cannot remember the receptionist s name as she deserves a bonus for the service she provides She was tall slim young and black and truly terrific She helped us with all of our questions served us drinks after our long day of walking suggested a great restaurant for dinner and smiled whenever we passed by Room was fantastic It was small as any other hotel room in Paris but we did not mind at all The decoration and design made up for the space Beautiful TV comfortable bed FANTASTIC shower lots of storage it was simply great Also my now fiance proposed to me on our first night there so I am sure we shall be back one day Thank you guys for such a fantastic stay

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: One of the lights flickered in our room 702 but it was not actually a problem as we the day light was enough most of the time We found breakfast a little pricey
Positive_Review: Staff were so kind and helpful and beds were so so comfy Just what we needed after full days of sightseeing

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The poor soundproofing my neighbours had sex at 4 am and the noise woke me up impossible to go back to sleep after that Not so good for privacy too you better try to make things silently
Positive_Review: Very clean and convenient nice room nice bed nice staff and good location

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: Clean Quiet Good Staff Perfect Bed Bathroom Decor modern unpretentious And delicious pastries 1 mn away first bakery same side on the right

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: We had a small issue with regard to the booking not showing up on their system But excellent staff managed to arrange a room for us and ensured we were comfy Rooms are small but comfy Very close to Metro Very modern rooms and facilities We loved the location due to it being a little away from city center so nice and quiet

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Booking com did not actually book the room for us Luckily our room was available Booking Com failed to explain why they did not book it After 3 attempts by me to ask them
Positive_Review: The staff were brilliant Very helpful and friendly Made our stay

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: Staff was great very friendly with a great mood and extremely serviceable The location is not centric but ver very convenient Breakfast is good and the installations are very good

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Nothing really was a problem the bed was relatively hard but still comfortable
Positive_Review: Great location excellent for shows at the Accors Arena Metro a few steps from the hotel door Pleasant staff Free wi fi

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: I had trouble with the AC but they were very helpful Otherwise all was fine
Positive_Review: Towels were huge and fluffy Seemed brand new in fact Lots of amenities from shampoo and Qtips to coffee with milk and teensy cookies in the room Excellent rain shower head as well Big pillows and a comfy bed

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The hotel is not right in the heart of any particular sightseeing area but is close enough to all of them not to put me off going again The Paris metro makes everywhere accessible The hotel is perfect for the AccorArena which is what we needed
Positive_Review: The staff here were so friendly and helpful it set us up and gave us extra confidence to roam around the city where we found people to be friendly too Not always the case in Paris The top floor rooms have a small balcony which made it better to look out over the busy streets Nice and quiet in the room though

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Nothing really it was perfect the staff are the best all of them
Positive_Review: Staff was super nice and helpful always had nice comment or word for us it felt homly and confy the hotel is new great bed great bathroom and tv feelt like 4 stars not 3 super clean honestly it was a joy to stay here and i will def come back

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: As I could not readily present my booking com reservation sheet I was charged a higher price than that in the offer I had received and accepted
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff The hotel rooms in better shape than in many other hotels in Paris but also rather expensive The metro station is just round the corner

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Too much air freshener made it difficult to breathe Naff decor light is the only reality slogan in each room Water pressure in shower not sufficient for washing hair you d have to use the handheld one and use the jet setting It s also really expensive 150 per night and 14 for breakfast
Positive_Review: Clean with helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The house keeping was late most of the time and didnt make the room for two days
Positive_Review: The stuff is very friendly and helpful especially the Greek girl she is very nice and kind

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: very practical and well designed bathroom congrats to the internal designer achitect optimal utilisation of space without tunnel narrow feeling friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Room so small could hear next door rooms using the bathroom not worth the money for the location the photography makes it look much bigger than it is Wouldn t recommend
Positive_Review: Staff good

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Some rooms are a bit tight but still very good regarding the price performance Advise payments in Paris I did not know that a banknote of Euro 500 or even Euro 200 is a problem in Paris If you need to change the money not even the bank have change Use your credit card to pay or take maximum banknotes of Euro 50 with you
Positive_Review: The welcome was warm and friendly We immediately felt at home During our stay the staff did everything to fulfill our needs The beds are very comfortable the shower fantastic and the T V is used as a mirror during daytime It is very clean and there is no noise to hear from the other rooms or from the street The Hotel is at a few steps to the M tro station Dugommier no need to take a cab The location of the Hotel is outstanding because the M tro stop Dugommier green line no 6 takes you directly to the Tour d Eiffel and has very good connections in order to go and see all the sights To sum it up very recommendable Enjoy your stay

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The shower was uncomfortable when you used it you cannot longer use the toilet because everything is wet there are no courtains
Positive_Review: It was very clean and new and the personal was very nice

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: Near to Lyon station but careful because the road is very long so know your way when come out of the station Nice painting in the room Comfortable matress n nice staff

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: First of all the staff was a pleasure to meet Always in a good mood and ready to help The room was clean and comfortable The bathroom was spacious and had an awesome bathtub Varieties of choice for breakfast

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: I was double charged from my credit card by the hotel One part should be used for pre authority however the hotel made it as real charge It takes long time to communicate with hotel via booking com and the problem has still been not solved
Positive_Review: Clean and closed to Metro

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Water tepid No electricity for plugs n first night Bacon and Sausages rather rubbery and not v hot Food generally rather cold
Positive_Review: Bed was clean and so was the linen Service very helpful Metro very near

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The hotel advertises to have soundproof rooms but in fact they aren t You can hear the TV from the rooms next to you and also the windows are regular which means you cannot shut out the sounds from the streets
Positive_Review: The bed was very good the rooms nice and clean and a friendly helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: We were given a double when we had confirmed a twin It was sorted out eventually No sign on the building so we walked straight past it No milk with the coffee in the room Room quite small
Positive_Review: The flat screen TV which doubled as a mirror The decor The location next to the Metro 10 minutes walk from Cour St Emilion with its shops and restaurants The reception were helpful

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Staff does not speak any other language then French We had to ask other guests for a translation in order to communicate with the Receptionist
Positive_Review: Very nicely renovated and just around the corner from metro station

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: Small toilet separated from bathroom but not so uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Exactly how I expected Comfy bed facilities great staff many languages spoken cleaning everyday nice location

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: The room was super clean the bed was super comfortable the style super modern and the staff super friendly helpful they were able to help me print my tickets last minute which made my louvre visit really great being able to skip the line because I already had printed tickets It is also located just outside of a metro stop which made it so easy to find All together really enjoyable and worthwhile stay here

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: when I first visited here it was difficult to find it as there wasn t any prominent sign
Positive_Review: the hotel was clean the view was nice and the service was nice

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The hotel was very expensive considering it was not in the centre of Paris it was 25 stops on the metro and changing for me to meet my friends I was misinformed as to the location I had to pay 14 euros extra for breakfast which I thought was expensive and I was under the impression that this was included in the price
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful they helped me to find my way around Paris giving me directions

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: We couldn t control the heating in the room had to have the windows open which resulted in a lot of traffic noise
Positive_Review: The location Next door to the metro a short walk to Bercy

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Negative_Review: The wifi at the hotel was very slow and I was also expecting the rooms to be a bit bigger than they actually were
Positive_Review: I liked the one young greek member of staff at the front desk who upgraded us when we said we were on our honeymoon The location although right next to a metro station was far from any good restaurants and we spent quite a long time trying to find a decent place to eat

Hotel_Name: Golden Tulip Bercy Gare de Lyon 209
Positive_Review: Grear
